product_name: Seattle Sports Pocket Bucket - Special Buy
long_description: Sturdy and watertight but collapsible for easy transport and storage, the Seattle Sports Pocket Bucket water carrier is an easy way to keep prefiltered water on hand in camp. Urethane-coated nylon construction with heavy-duty bottom and webbing carry handle. Lightweight bucket packs down to barely larger than a deck of cards. Special buy.
short_description: Sturdy and watertight but collapsible for easy transport and storage, the Seattle Sports Pocket Bucket water carrier is an easy way to keep prefiltered water on hand in camp.
